New Zealand clipped regional boundaries

Source: R/data.R
nz_region.Rd

Simplified New Zealand regional boundaries, excluding the Chatham Islands.

nz_region

Format

An sf object.

Examples

nz_region
#> Simple feature collection with 16 features and 3 fields
#> geometry type:  MULTIPOLYGON
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: 166.4261 ymin: -47.28981 xmax: 178.5504 ymax: -34.39263
#> CRS:            EPSG:4326

ggplot_sf(nz_region)

ggplot_sf(dplyr::filter(nz_region, region == "Wellington"))
